timeline.message:
refactor: Values Table have duplicate data for _id and _lastUpdated
#1388

- FHIRPersistenceJDBCImpl filters the codes in the
extractParameterValues step and keeps the parameter values from hitting
the corresponding tables

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

fix: Chained Search with _id result in Http Status 500 #1384

- Add a branch for _id to be called/used off of the chained reference
table
- Clean up QuerySegment Aggregator for _id
- Removed unused imports from persistence-jdbc
- Take out the deprecated API call in AbstractSearchIdAndLastUpdatedTest

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

fix: Whole system search with multiple _lastUpdated results in incorrect
queries #1383

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

fix: Whole system search with multiple _lastUpdated results in incorrect
queries #1383

- Tone down logging in SearchChainTest

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>
